Description:
Identifies when a network connection is new or rare related to any logon type by a given account today based on comparison with the previous 14 days.
Network connections are indicated by the EventID 4624 with LogonType = 3
Name: c47574eb-bc3a-4b49-a278-ada07e917c4f
Query:
let starttime = 14d;
let endtime = 1h;
let rpd_table=
    (union isfuzzy=true
        (SecurityEvent
        | where TimeGenerated >= ago(endtime)
        | where EventID == 4624 and LogonType == 3
        | summarize
            StartTime = min(TimeGenerated),
            EndTime = max(TimeGenerated),
            ConnectionCount = count()
            by
            Account = tolower(Account),
            Computer = toupper(Computer),
            IpAddress,
            AccountType,
            Activity,
            LogonTypeName,
            ProcessName
        // use left anti to exclude anything from the previous 14 days that is not rare
        ),
        (WindowsEvent
        | where TimeGenerated >= ago(endtime)
        | where EventID == 4624 and EventData has ("3")
        | extend LogonType = tostring(EventData.LogonType)
        | where LogonType == 3 
        | extend Account = strcat(tostring(EventData.TargetDomainName), "\\", tostring(EventData.TargetUserName))
        | extend ProcessName = tostring(EventData.ProcessName)
        | extend IpAddress = tostring(EventData.IpAddress)
        | extend TargetUserSid = tostring(EventData.TargetUserSid)
        | extend AccountType=case(Account endswith "$" or TargetUserSid in ("S-1-5-18", "S-1-5-19", "S-1-5-20"), "Machine", isempty(TargetUserSid), "", "User")
        | extend Activity="4624 - An account was successfully logged on."
        | extend LogonTypeName="10 - RemoteInteractive"
        | summarize
            StartTime = min(TimeGenerated),
            EndTime = max(TimeGenerated),
            ConnectionCount = count()
            by
            Account = tolower(Account),
            Computer = toupper(Computer),
            IpAddress,
            AccountType,
            Activity,
            LogonTypeName,
            ProcessName
        ))
    | join kind=leftanti (
        (union isfuzzy=true
            (SecurityEvent
            | where TimeGenerated between (ago(starttime) .. ago(endtime))
            | where LogonType == 3 and AccountType contains "User"
            | where EventID == 4624
            | summarize by Computer = toupper(Computer), IpAddress, Account = tolower(Account)
            ),
            (WindowsEvent
            | where TimeGenerated between (ago(starttime) .. ago(endtime))
            | where EventID == 4624
            | extend IpAddress = tostring(EventData.IpAddress)
            | extend Account = strcat(tostring(EventData.TargetDomainName), "\\", tostring(EventData.TargetUserName))
            | summarize by Computer = toupper(Computer), IpAddress, Account = tolower(Account)
            ))
        )
        on IpAddress
    | summarize
        StartTime = min(StartTime),
        EndTime = max(EndTime),
        ConnectionCount = sum(ConnectionCount)
        by Account, Computer, IpAddress, AccountType, Activity, LogonTypeName, ProcessName
    | extend
        timestamp = StartTime,
        AccountCustomEntity = Account,
        HostCustomEntity = Computer,
        IPCustomEntity = IpAddress;
let additional_info_attempts = SecurityEvent
    | where EventID == 4624
    | project
        TimeGenerated,
        Account,
        Computer,
        IpAddress,
        AccountType,
        Activity,
        LogonTypeName,
        ProcessName
    | summarize IPSuccessfulAttempts14DaysCount = count() by IpAddress;
let additional_info_time = SecurityEvent
    | where EventID == 4624
    | project
        TimeGenerated,
        Account,
        Computer,
        IpAddress,
        AccountType,
        Activity,
        LogonTypeName,
        ProcessName
    | summarize OldestSuccessfulAttemptfrom14Days = min(TimeGenerated) by IpAddress;
rpd_table
| join kind=leftouter additional_info_attempts on IpAddress
| join kind=leftouter additional_info_time on IpAddress
| project
    Account,
    Computer,
    IpAddress,
    AccountType,
    Activity,
    LogonTypeName,
    ProcessName,
    StartTime,
    EndTime,
    timestamp,
    ConnectionCount,
    IPSuccessfulAttempts14DaysCount,
    OldestSuccessfulAttemptfrom14Days,
    AccountCustomEntity,
    HostCustomEntity,
    IPCustomEntity
| where not( ipv4_is_private( IPCustomEntity))
| where not( IPCustomEntity == "0.0.0.0")
| where not( IPCustomEntity == "127.0.0.1")
| where not( IPCustomEntity contains "169.254")
| where not( isempty(IPCustomEntity ))
